title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Colin on KD, Rodgers and Russ, Cowboys Get Right with Matt Mosley, Tom Curran on Mac, Belichick, Brady
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Colin on KD, Rodgers and Russ, Cowboys Get Right with Matt Mosley, Tom Curran on Mac, Belichick, Brady
description:
It's the best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast! First, Colin's top takes of week, including why Kevin Durant-to-the-Nets is becoming the weirdest decision in sports history (3:00), which QB is more likely to demand a trade between Russell Wilson and Aaron Rodgers (7:00), and why no one cares Zac Taylor gambles his face off during the offseason (10:00). Then, longtime Dallas Cowboys writer - and host of The Doomsday Podcast - Matt Mosley and Colin discuss the keys to the Cowboys' dominant bounce back win against the Falcons after a disappointing let down loss to Denver (16:00), and if it's too early to call Dallas a Super Bowl contender (19:00). Next, Longtime Patriots Insider Tom Curran of NBC Sports Boston comes on to discuss why Mac Jones' early success took him by surprise (27:00), why Belichick's system has bounced back (30:00), and what Brady and Belichick might say to each other today (35:00). Finally, The Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if he's "sharp" or "square" with his Steelers/Chargers (40:00), Cowboys/Chiefs (43:00), Cardinals/Seahawks (45:00), and Saints/Eagles (47:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
